title: (4322) 2 Storied House for Sale, Nugegoda Pagoda Road
details: 2 Storied House for Sale, Nugegoda Pagoda Road. Built 10 Perches, 4 Bed Rooms, Attached Bath Rooms, A/C Toilets Spacious Living and Dining Area. Pantry, Kitchen Front and Rear Gardens. Parking 3 Vehicles Servants Bath Toilet, Rs: 310 (Negotiable) 31 Million
